Html:
Error: server version is different from console version. you won't be able to publish updates.

Server version is 3.2.7600.256 - WSUS is windows 2k3 server
Console version is 3.2.7600.226 - Windows 7 pro desktop

Is there away to update the client to match the server? or is this a limitation on WSUS that would force us to use WPP directly on the server?
Install Microsoft KB2734608 on the Windows 7 to upgrade the console.

Thanks for the help, and this amazing tool :)

For future reference you need to install the patch as follows on windows 7 computers:
WSUS-KB2734608-x64.exe /q C:\MySetup.log
